attributes.action: remove the link between carer's allowance and earnings so that carers can earn enough to get an acceptable standard of living and to recognise their contribution to society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carers often care 24-7 and also work part time but if they earn more than £84 a week net they are disqualified from receiving carer's allowance.  Working does not necessarily detract from the amount of care they give or the value of their caring. In addition to giving an opportunity for elderly or disabled people to live at home and so have better quality of life, carers are saving money for government and should be recognised as such.
